name: The Martyrdom of Saint Justina
description: The Martyrdom of Saint Justina; Paolo Veronese (Paolo Caliari) (Italian, 1528 - 1588); Italy; 1575; Pen and brown ink, brush with brown and gray washes, heightened with white gouache, on blue paper; squared in black chalk for transfer; 47 × 24 cm (18 1/2 × 9 7/16 in.); 87.GA.92; J. Paul Getty Museum, Los Angeles, California
title: The Martyrdom of Saint Justina
medium: Pen and brown ink, brush with brown and gray washes, heightened with white gouache, on blue paper; squared in black chalk for transfer
